title: Managing orchard mites
creator_credit: CSIRO, S.T. Evans and Roger Seccombe
brief_description: Spraying orchards for pests and diseases which attack crops often destroys the balance between insect pests and their natural predators. This was the case with spider mites. Research into this problem has led to successful control by combining a modified spray program compatible with introduced mite predators.
